"Reconocimiento Especial: Cantera":
"The Darker influence at the Cantera on
Lillipa is growing at an alarming rate.
As a result, the local fauna have become
overwhelmingly powerful. We've created
a quarantine area; only Arks who possess
Advanced Capsules are permitted inside.
As a secret advanced squad, you must
enter the area and suppress the natives!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Defeat at boss/time runs out"

"Debes pagar 1 Advance Capsule b
en el Campship."

"Debes pagar 10 Advance Capsule e
en el Campship."
